hopobject.name: Lapdock
hopobject.body: A single special cable can repurpose a Motorola Atrix Phone Lapdock to create a complete BeagleBone Black computer that boots from Linux Angstrom included in the stock BeagleBone eMMC storage.
hopobject.shortdesc: Motorola Atrix Phone Lapdock can be used as display, keyboard, mouse, and rechargeable battery power for a complete BeagleBone Black computer.
